<summary>Notes</summary>
<br>

**Forms:** Nodular & diffuse; some distinguish tracheobronchial <br>
AL most common, followed by AA, other rare. Subtyping by IHC or mass spectrometry.
<br><br>
**Therapy:** <br>treat underlying disease.
<br><br>
**Microscopy:** <br> HE: Homogeneous eosinophilic amorphous material; Kongo: positiv (red), apple green birefringence on polarization.
